title.description: Names the specific work to which the entry refers

workId.description: Identifies a work with a unique number

workDescription.description: Provides detailed information about a work

version.description: A version of a work is different from other versions in its code and it thus provides a distinct experience

versionId.description: Identifies a version of a work with a unique number

versionNumber.description: Identifies the specific version of a work

versionLetter.description: Modifies version number where needed in order to identify small differences between versions

galleryImages.description: Identifies images featured in the carousel for a work

galleryImageCaption.description: Describes an image featured in the carousel for a work

imageHighlight.description: Identifies an image that appears in carousels for a category or collection

imageThumbnail.description: Identifies a smaller version of a full-sized image

originalPublicationStatus.description: Identifies the status of a version of a work as either published or unpublished

incomplete.description: Describes a work that was never finished as originally envisioned by the author

authorialVersion.description: Identifies a given version of a work as the authoritative version and emphasizes it in search

originalPublicationMonth.description: Identifies the month or season in which a version of a work was published

originalPublicationYear.description: Identifies the year in which a version of a work was published

originalPublicationType.description: Describes unique versions of works and the containers in which they are collected

originalPublisher.description: Identifies the individual or group responsible for publishing a specific version of a work

originalPublisherAuthority.description: Locates the authority that identifies a publisher of a version of a work

originalVolume.description: Identifies the volume of a journal that published a version of a work

originalIssue.description: Identifies the issue of a journal that published a version of a work

originalMediaFormat.description: Describes the type of physical media on which a version of a work resides

softwareDependencies.description: Identifies software platforms, programs, and standards required to access and experience the work

authoringPlatform.description: Describes the primary digital tool used in the production of a work

hardwareDependencies.description: Identifies the kind of computing device and its onboard components required to access and experience the work

peripheralDependencies.description: Describes additional hardware not integral to the ordinary function of the original computing device

computerLanguages.description: Describes the code base used in the production of a work

digitalQualities.description: Describes the technical aspects of a work

sensoryModalities.description: Describes the sense(s) the work evokes

genres.description: Describes the artistic genre(s) of a work

languages.description: Identifies the language(s) used in creation and/or translation of a work

accessibility.description: Describes the hardware, software, and physical aspects involved in accessing and experiencing the work

rightsNotice.description: Describes the permissions an end user has been granted to use the work

eldLink.description: Locates a version of a work in the Electronic Literature Directory (ELD)

elmcipLink.description: Locates a version of a work in the Electronic Literature as a Model of Creativity and Innovation in Practice (ELMCIP) database

rebootingElectronicLiteratureLink.description: Locates a version of a work in Rebooting Electronic Literature

contentTiming.description: Describes the speed of a work's content

textFormat.description: Describes how a work implements font families, font size, and effects

colorAndContrast.description: Attends to partial visual disability and color blindness

visualImpact.description: Describes visual elements that may startle, surprise, or be hazardous for visitors

auditory.description: Describes sounds produced by the work

touch.description: Describes how visitors interface with the work physically by making contact with screens, buttons, dials, etc.

hapticFeedback.description: Describes how the work registers meaningful physical feedback in a visitor's body

repetitiveMotion.description: Describes works that require repetitive physical input from visitors

movementAndGesture.description: The work registers the visitor's non-touch physical movements as input

copy.description: Each copy of a version of a work is identical, though may differ in media format

copyId.description: Identifies a copy of a work with a unique number

copyImages.description: Identifies images of a unique copy of a work

copyPublicationStatus.description: Identifies the status of a copy of a version of a work as either published or unpublished

copyPublicationMonth.description: Identifies the month or season in which a copy of a work was published

copyPublicationYear.description: Identifies the year in which a copy of a work was published

copyPublicationType.description: Describes unique copies of works and the containers in which they are collected

copyPublisher.description: Identifies the individual or group responsible for publishing a specific copy of a work

copyPublisherAuthority.description: Locates the authority that identifies a publisher of a copy of a work

copyVolume.description: Identifies the volume of a journal that published a copy of a work

copyIssue.description: Identifies the issue of a journal that published a copy of a work

copyMediaFormat.description: Describes the type of physical media on which a copy of a version of a work resides

originalUrl.description: Locates where the copy of a work was initially hosted

hostedUrl.description: Locates a copy of a work held locally within the archive

downloadLink.description: Provides a copy of a work for download

provenance.description: Provides the acquisition history of a particular copy of a version of a work

availability.description: Indicates the extent to which a copy of a version of a work can be experienced

preservationMethods.description: Describes process(es) used to make an outmoded copy of a version of a work able to be accessed and experienced

preservationNotes.description: Provides information about how an outmoded copy of a version of a work was made to be accessed and experienced

lastTestedDate.description: Identifies when a preserved copy of a version of a work was last tested

lastTestedWith.description: Identifies the hardware and software on and with which a preserved copy of a version of a work was tested

entityName.description: Identifies an individual or group involved in the production of a work

entityId.description: Identifies an individual or group involved in the production of a work with a unique number

nameAuthority.description: Locates the authority that identifies an individual entity

entityType.description: Identifies a producer of the work as an individual or a group

entityCountryOfOrigin.description: Describes an entity's country of origin

role.description: Identifies the function performed by an entity in the production of a work, as described by MARC relators

roleAbbreviation.description: Abbreviates the function performed by an entity in the production of a work, as described by MARC relators

primaryRole.description: Identifies the lead entity in the production of a work

rolePseudonym.description: Identifies an alternative name used by an entity in the creation or publication of a version of a work

entityRoleId.description: Connects an entity with a copy or a version on the back end with a unique number while describing the role the entity performed

collectionId.description: Identifies a collection of works with a unique number

collectionDescription.description: Provides detailed information about a collection of works

collectionHostedUrl.description: Locates a collection of works in the archive

collectionMetaDescription.description: Provides a truncated version of a collection's description for the purpose of search and findability

collectionMetaTitle.description: Provides a version of a collection's title for the purpose of search and findability

collectionMetaKeywords.description: Provides keywords for the purpose of search and findability

collectionImage.description: Identifies an image that represents a collection of works in the archive

collectionHeaderImage.description: Identifies an image that is featured at the top of a collection space

collectionVideoLink.description: Locates a local video file that introduces a collection of works

collectionVideoExternalLink.description: Locates an extended version of the video file hosted offsite that introduces a collection of works

collectionVideoThumbnail.description: Identifies the cover image for a collection video

collectionType.description: Describes how the works in a given collection of works are grouped and categorized

collectionProvenance.description: Provides the acquisition history of a particular collection of works

startYearCollected.description: Identifies the earliest original publication year of works within a collection of works

endYearCollected.description: Identifies the latest original publication year of works within a collection of works

responsibility.description: Identifies the individual or group responsible for the creation or management of a collection

externalLinkName.description: Describes a piece of content located outside of the collection, version, or copy

externalLinkId.description: Identifies a piece of content located outside of the collection with a unique number

externalLinkUrl.description: Locates a piece of content not affiliated with The NEXT, ELD, ELMCIP, or Rebooting Electronic Literature

altText.description: Provides a metadescription of an image file at the collection and version levels for the purposes of accessibility

notes.description: Provides further information at the work, version, and copy levels where needed
